[A place in which a thing is looked at]: a place, or state, in which one likes to be looked at. (T, A, TA.) You say, (tropical:) Such a one is in a state in which he likes to be looked at and listened to [and in a state in which he is satisfied with drink and food]. (T, A, TA.) And (tropical:) Thou wast in a state [in] which thou likedst [to be looked at], away from this place of abode.
